snippet: It will take more work and analysis before physicists have the cold numbers that clinch the case that the new particle announced last July is in fact the long-lost Higgs boson.
abstract: Physicists say that more work and analysis lies ahead before they will have cold numbers that will confirm that new particle announced on July 4, 2011 is in fact the Higgs boson.
lead_paragraph: It will take more work and analysis before physicists have the cold numbers that clinch the case that the new particle announced last July is in fact the long-lost Higgs boson.

headline.seo: All Signs Point to Higgs Boson, but Still Waiting for Scientific Certainty
headline.main: All Signs Point to Higgs, but Scientific Certainty Is a Waiting Game
headline.print_headline: All Signs Point to Higgs, but Scientific Certainty Is a Waiting Game
